unit_learning_outcomes.description: Demonstrate safe, effective, patient-centred skills and competencies in delivering high quality assessment and management strategies for treating lymphoedema (Clinical Practitioner)
Uses feedback from teachers, clinicians, peers and patients to inform self-evaluation and critical reflection of knowledge and skill development (Professional)
Demonstrate evidence based best practice management skills to achieve patient-centred personalised whole person care for the assessment and management of treating lymphoedema (Scientist and Scholar)
Discuss emerging survivorship issues  and strategies to address the issues identified  by individuals with lymphoedema (Professional)

non_scheduled_learning_activities.description: A component of this micro unit will be presented as a series of well designed learning activities with embedded readings and knowledge checks.

enrolment_rules.description: AQF level 7 in a health degree or recognised equivalent with national registration if required

assessments.description: Multiple choice questions and short answer

school.value: Faculty of Medicine, Health and Human Sciences

data.description: This unit is one of a series of units examining specialist skill areas of clinical practice within lymphoedema and related areas of management and clinical relevance. In this unit you will develop an understanding and insight into survivorship and living with lymphoedema from an individual’s perspective. In this unit you will develop an understanding and insight into how lymphoedema and its treatments impact an individual physically, functionally, psychologically, and financially. This unit will cover the relationship of healthcare professionals and those individuals living with lymphoedema. You will understand factors that influence patient-centred personalised whole person care such as partnering your patient in a positive therapeutic relationship and learn how to apply principles of chronic disease management to tailor intervention to the condition and individual goals. You will be encouraged to reflect on your own development. The unit will assist your development of the Scientist and Scholar, Clinical Practitioner and Professional graduate capabilities.
data.title: Survivorship: Living with Lymphoedema

title: Survivorship: Living with Lymphoedema
